title: sportsdataverse • Data and Tools for Sports Data Analytics
text: can install released version sportsdataverse GitHub :
code: # You can install using the pacman package using the following code: if (!requireNamespace('pacman', quietly = TRUE)){   install.packages('pacman') } pacman::p_load_current_gh("saiemgilani/sportsdataverse-R") # Alternatively, using the devtools package: if (!requireNamespace('devtools', quietly = TRUE)){   install.packages('devtools') } devtools::install_github(repo = "saiemgilani/sportsdataverse-R") sportsdataverse::sportsdataverse_logo()
